name: Forest Survival
summary:
《Forest Survival》 is an adventure collection game, which is presented in the form of first-person control. Players in the game are alone in the Forest, and they can use axes, cut down trees and build freely to explore the surrounding things. In order to survive, players need to find at least 20 canned fish stocks to use, after the search can be cleared. 
WASD character control 
E pick up items and so on 
ESC brings up the menu to see how many cans are collected
